ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups dry roasted almonds, no salt added

cookingTips: Chop garlic and rosemary finely so they distribute evenly and don't burn during cooking
Warm olive oil with garlic and rosemary over low heat for 1-2 minutes to infuse flavor before adding almonds
Toast almonds for 3-5 minutes, stirring frequently, until fragrant—do not let them darken significantly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Are you looking for a healthy, quick snack? Would you like variations on seasonings?
